i got this to work with yasu.. but its in german.

Instructions for changing to english

1)Instal Red Ocean (english)
2)Apply no cd-crack.
3)Start game........If in dutch do the following
4)Stop game and go to C:\Documents and Settings\YOUR NAME HERE\My Documents\Red Ocean AND OPEN FOLDER (in vista: C:\Users\YOUR NAMN HERE\Documents\Red Ocean )
5)Open "Red Ocean.ini" using notepad(IF REQUIRED) and change " LANGUAGE-DE " to " LANGUAGE-EN " and save changes.
